channel.title: Ataraxia
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sj39E7c.png[/img]
Ataraxia is a newly public server in a 317 revision, loading 525 Map Data. We strive to give an enhanced oldschool feel to our players, which is challenging, but rewarding. The Ataraxia staff team is diligently working to provide the best experience that we can. With that being said, the player base is the driving force behind the server, so we take suggestions seriously.
Founder: Zoidberg Owners: Zen & Plague Admins: *none* Global Moderator: Zezarely Forum Moderator: *none* Moderators: Stenny & Ruin
VPS Hosted Cache Downloader Forums and Website
[SPOILER=Client Sided Features] -498 Map Area with Orbs -474 Tab Area -Countless custom interfaces -Old school Skill Tab -525 Maps -474 Player models -Custom Client Art -Custom Crowns [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Server Sided Features]
[SPOILER=Misc Features] -Trivia System with Points -Pk Points System -KDR System -Many Working Doors -Clan Chat with Ranks -Donation Shop -Low-Cash Economy -Bronze, Silver and Gold Donor Ranks -Custom Titles with choice of 13 colors.
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Skills] [COLOR="#008080"][U]Slayer[/U][/COLOR] -Easy, Medium, Hard and Boss Tasks -Slayer Points Shop -Slayer Rewards Shop -Slayer Helmet gives extra points and XP per task
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Mining[/U][/COLOR] -Falador Mining Area -Working guild ladders -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Ore depletion coming soon[/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Prospecting Coming Soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Thieving[/U][/COLOR] -1 thieving stall -XP and Gold given based on level -Pickpocketting
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Herblore[/U][/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Coming Soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Fishing[/U][/COLOR] -Fishing guild training area -Good fishing timer
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Cooking[/U][/COLOR] -Functioning cooking system -[COLOR="#FF0000"]More Food coming soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Crafting[/U][/COLOR] -Gem Crafting -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Leather & D'hide crafting coming soon[/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Flax Picking and spinning coming soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Firemaking[/U][/COLOR] -Clipped Firemaking -Most Logs working -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Colored fires coming soon[/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Lanterns coming soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Fletching[/U][/COLOR] -Arrow shafts -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Bows(u) coming soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Woodcutting[/U][/COLOR] -Functioning woodcut system -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Stumps coming soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Runecrafting[/U][/COLOR] -Standard Runecrafting System -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Abyss Coming Soon[/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]Talisman Locating Coming Soon[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008080"][U]Farming[/U][/COLOR] -[COLOR="#FF0000"]coming soon[/COLOR][/SPOILER]
[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Ataraxia
item.dc:creator: @OwnerZen OwnerZen
item.description:
@OwnerZen wrote:

[CENTER]

Ataraxia is a newly public server in a 317 revision, loading 525 Map Data.
We strive to give an enhanced oldschool feel to our players, which is challenging, but rewarding.
The Ataraxia staff team is diligently working to provide the best experience that we can.
With that being said, the player base is the driving force behind the server, so we take suggestions seriously.
